metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1125 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Portals in Google Chrome prior to 100.0.4896.60 allowed aremote attacker who convinced a user to engage in specific user interactionto potentially exploit heap corruption via user interaction.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
